title: Please help me! How can I add and use my (Telekom Hungary) esim to Pixel 4?
content:
I can activate my esim. After having scanned the QR code the activation fails.
Is this feature (e-sim in Pixel 4) available in Hungary? By Telekom Hungary?
The operator states they can support or they can guarantee the service for those phones that they are selling.
But what is the difference between a Google and a Samsung phone? OK, I know very well, that's the reason why im waiting so long for my Pixel 4.
Does anybody know (or suggest) how can I solve this issue?
